author: wn.com
title: INDIA: Migrant Workers’ Rights Coalition Advocates Decent Work for Migrants (BWI - Building and Wood ...
text: ( Source : BWI - Building and Wood Worker 's International ) In the South Indian state Tamil Nadu - the Migrant Workers' Rights Coalition that was created a few months back held a gathering on World Day for Decent Work on the 7th of October.
